EmailTemplate.name: Voicemail, trying to reach you
EmailTemplate.subject: EFS and T-Chek: Sorry I missed you
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.FirstName}, My name is {!Contact.OwnerFullName}, an Account Executive with EFS and T-Chek. I attempted to contact you to discuss how our fuel card program can save you time, money and provide you the account security you need.
As I mentioned in my message, I look forward to speaking with you personally regarding the specific benefits of our fuel card program and how they relate to your business.
I realize how valuable your time is. Please let me know when a good time to connect would be and I will be happy to get in touch with you.
Sincerely, Katie Haywood Sr Account Executive - Inside Sales OTR WEX Inc. 3102 West End Ave., Suite 900, Nashville, TN 37203 Office (615) 523-6496 | Fax (615) 850-0799
khaywood@fleetone.com
www.efsllc.com
www.fleetone.com
www.wexinc.com
